column5: Just wondering if anyone has stayed at this place and if they were satisfied with the accomodations provided.

v shot, go back to the home page and click on search (located near the top) then type in lac seul adventures and lots of old posts will come up. not much good has been said about them and they were using this forum quite a bit a couple months ago to push their place but were constantly harrassed as that is a not appropriate on this board. i did send them an inquiree a couple months ago and they did reply saying they had a cabin available for june 16 -23. GO BP! scar
